summary: Thinking about what to do with Glencore stock right now? You are not alone. When it comes to resource giants, Glencore has always been a lightning rod for both bullish bets and cautious sidesteps. Whether you are holding or watching from the sidelines, recent price swings have definitely given investors something to talk about. Over just the past week, shares have moved up 5.8%, hinting at renewed optimism in the market. Zooming out a bit, the last 30 days have seen a more modest gain of...
